analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/18/0x49f2fbce74a445c0e6d2e4d6538827c2e51ff548.sol:
	Contract RETURNCOIN has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/18/0x49f2fbce74a445c0e6d2e4d6538827c2e51ff548.sol#218)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/18/0x49f2fbce74a445c0e6d2e4d6538827c2e51ff548.sol#88) is not in mixedCase
